Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale of food or beverages containing kratom and 7-hydroxymitragynine
Summary: Prohibits the sale or offering for sale, delivery or manufacture of food or beverages containing kratom or its derivatives, or 7-hydroxymitragynine; provides penalties.
LawCode: Add ยง398-g, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of food or beverages containing kratom and 7-hydroxymitragynine
